output_list.vulnerability: Transfer can be manipulated to transfer more tokens than it actually should.
output_list.reason: If a user is able to call this function with a value greater than the amount of tokens they actually own, it would allow them to transfer more tokens than they should and gain an unfair advantage.

output_list.vulnerability: Safe multiplication can be manipulated to produce incorrect results.
output_list.reason: If a user is able to call this function with incorrect inputs (a or b), the result will be incorrect and can be manipulated to their advantage.
